name: Bars, Barns, & Bartering
description:
This game was made for the DevLUp Jam 2022.

Overview:

Your brother has gone out of town and entrusted you with their shop for a week. Your goal is to run the shop successfully by trading with clients that come in. Each trader will offer you several trades that are all worth your money, but unfortunately for you, you can *only pick one!* And if you refuse the trade, your bad luck may catch up to you as the traders become more and more aggressive!

Traders also love gambling, and if a particular trade looks appealing to you, you can gamble on it to make it better or worse, but again, you can only *pick one* trade to gamble on.

To keep the shop running, you must also fulfill the king's orders. If you don't pay the King what he wants, your brother's shop may be in jeopardy. The King does offer you some choices on what to give him, but again, you must *just pick one!*

Controls:

Interact - Left Click

Credits:
